entry.title: In-tree volume plugins remove dynamic provisioning support
entry.summary:
### Enhancement Description
- One-line enhancement description (can be used as a release note): Remove dynamic provisioning support from the hostPath in-tree volume plugin. - Kubernetes Enhancement Proposal: <!-- link to kubernetes/enhancements file; if none yet, link to PR --> - Discussion Link: - https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/123804 - Primary contact (assignee): @carlory - Responsible SIGs: sig-storage - Enhancement target (which target equals to which milestone): 1.31 - Alpha release target (x.y): 1.31 - Beta release target (x.y): - Stable release target (x.y): - [ ] Alpha - [ ] KEP (`k/enhancements`) update PR(s): https://github.com/kubernetes/enhancements/pull/4548 - [ ] Code (`k/k`) update PR(s): https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/123841 - [ ] Docs (`k/website`) update PR(s):
